chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
w: world
this: nid
s3: state
s2: state
s1: state

Goal:
network_rely s1 s2 -> network_rely s2 s3 -> network_rely s1 s3

Premises:
network_rely = fun s1 s2 : state => exists n : nat, network_rely' n s1 s2 : state -> state -> Prop
rely_refl : forall s : state, s \In Coh w -> network_rely s s
network_rely' = fix network_rely' (n : nat) (s1 s2 : state) {struct n} : Prop := match n with | 0 => s1 = s2 /\ s1 \In Coh w | n'.+1 => exists (z : nat_eqType) (s3 : state), [/\ this != z, network_step w z s1 s3 & network_rely' n' s3 s2] end : nat -> state -> state -> Prop Arguments network_rely' _%nat_scope
Idle : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2
step_preserves_labels : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_step w this s1 s2 -> dom s1 =i dom s2
step_coh : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_step w this s1 s2 -> Coh w s1 /\ Coh w s2
stepV1 : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_step w this s1 s2 -> valid s1
stepV2 : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_step w this s1 s2 -> valid s2
step_preserves_node_ids : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (l : Label), l \in dom s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2 -> dom (dstate (gets s1 l)) =i dom (dstate (gets s2 l))
step_is_local : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label), network_step w this s1 s2 -> forall z : nat_eqType, z != this -> find z (dstate (gets s1 l)) = find z (dstate (gets s2 l))
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (gets s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]
CohUn : forall (w1 w2 : world) (s1 s2 : state), Coh w1 s1 -> Coh w2 s2 -> valid (w1 \+ w2) -> Coh (w1 \+ w2) (s1 \+ s2)
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (gets s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (gets s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (gets s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (gets s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
ReceiveMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), rt \In get_rt w l -> forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (pf : this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (gets s1 l)), l \in dom s1 -> forall (C : Coh w s1) (msg0 : TaggedMessage), tag msg0 = t_rcv rt ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2
Transitions.send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
Transitions.s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
Transitions.r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
Transitions.msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
hook_type = heap -> heap -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop : Type
send_step_t = Transitions.send_step_t : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments send_step_t _%function_scope
nodes = Protocols.nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
ReceiveTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_rcv : nat) (msg_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) (receive_step : Transitions.receive_step_t coh), Transitions.r_step_coh_t msg_wf t_rcv receive_step -> Transitions.receive_trans coh
Transitions.ReceiveTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_rcv : nat) (msg_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) (receive_step : Transitions.receive_step_t coh), Transitions.r_step_coh_t msg_wf t_rcv receive_step -> Transitions.receive_trans coh
cohpred_PredType = fun nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid => mkPredType (Coherence.sort (nodes:=nodes)) : (dstatelet -> pred nid) -> PredType dstatelet Arguments cohpred_PredType _%function_scope
